Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"addMarket((bytes32,address,address,address,address,uint256,uint16,address,address))":{"params":{"config":"Packed market configuration including routing and metadata."}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. d7105d9fbacc7386ee5c796df1d45b21617","dweb:/ipfs/QmadRjHbkicwqwwh61raUEapaVEtaLMcYbQZWs9gUkgj3u"]},"src/Interfaces/IMarketRegistry.sol":{"keccak256":"0x4f637ffd8128b69a2aa237316c0c1dffb50b60f507b5798e4971693023f9b449","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://3b175e29b20f3d0caf4a25b57ecd39f2b2f9617c5c7ea1dd6ef83756d6a0115a","dweb:/ipfs/QmXwjDfuJAni2BwmRpsNzB48mGFtxhVMkTtQrnyKA4n1bD"]},"src/MarketRegistry.sol":{"keccak256":"0x99b48d987e312cd325d9c57c38d25fe8822d6a625d4127ef974b29b956bb0701","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://da83ec080a6bd17e54819967d5dd63a4254849e9bfb45f0d4dbbb46900c1ba10","dweb:/ipfs/QmSRvd9ZcJR2UZYv3g9gwUYBK1eFx3J23si5HdF7JDM7eP"]}},"version":1}

params.config: Packed market configuration including routing and metadata.

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

pauseMarket(bytes32,bool).details: Pausing requires PAUSE_GUARDIAN or DEFAULT_ADMIN. Unpausing requires MARKET_ADMIN or DEFAULT_ADMIN.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

MAX_FEE_BPS().notice: Max trade fee in basis points that governance allows (3.00%).

PARAM_ADMIN_ROLE().notice: Role allowed to update fee params.

PAUSE_GUARDIAN_ROLE().notice: Role allowed to pause markets quickly.

addMarket((bytes32,address,address,addre.notice: Register a new perpetual market with its vAMM, oracle, fee router, insurance fund and metadata.

constructor.notice: Constructor grants DEFAULT_ADMIN to the deployer to bootstrap role assignments.

exists(bytes32).notice: Returns true if a marketId has been registered.

getMarket(bytes32).notice: Return the stored Market struct for a given marketId.

isActive(bytes32).notice: Whether a market is generally active for trading (excludes paused).

setMarketParams(bytes32,uint16,address,a.notice: Update fee params and routing for an existing market.
